tools.name: getAllCustomers
tools.description: Get customers with filters. Note: At least one filter must be provided (CustomerIds, Emails, FirstNames, LastNames, LoyaltyCodes, CompanyIds, CreatedUtc, UpdatedUtc, or DeletedUtc). If no filters are specified, defaults to ActivityStates: ["Active"] to return all active customers. IMPORTANT LIMITATIONS: Date range filters (CreatedUtc, UpdatedUtc, DeletedUtc) have a maximum interval of 3 months and 1 day. All array filters have specific maximum item limits (typically 1000, except CompanyIds which is limited to 1).

Extent.description: Extent of data to be returned

ChainIds.description: Unique identifiers of the chains. Required when using Portfolio Access Tokens, ignored otherwise.

CompanyIds.description: Unique identifier of the Company the customer is associated with

CreatedUtc.description: Interval in which Customer was created (max length 3 months)

DeletedUtc.description: Interval in which Customer was deleted (max length 3 months)

Limitation.description: Limitation on the quantity of data returned

UpdatedUtc.description: Interval in which Customer was updated (max length 3 months)

CustomerIds.description: Unique identifiers of Customers. Required if no other filter is provided.

ActivityStates.description: Whether to return only active, only deleted or both records

tools.name: getAllAccountingItems
tools.description: Returns all accounting items (charges, payments, etc.) based on filter parameters. REQUIRED: At least one of the following filters must be specified: AccountingItemIds, RebatedItemIds, ClosedUtc, ConsumedUtc, or UpdatedUtc.

ClosedUtc.description: Date range filter for when items were closed (one of the required filters)

CreatedUtc.description: Date range filter for item creation

UpdatedUtc.description: Date range filter for when items were last updated (one of the required filters)

ConsumedUtc.description: Date range filter for item consumption (one of the required filters)

RebatedItemIds.description: Filter by rebated item IDs (one of the required filters)

AccountingItemIds.description: Filter by specific item IDs (one of the required filters)

Note: At least one filter must be provided (CreatedUtc, UpdatedUtc, CollidingUtc, AvailabilityBlockIds, or ExternalIdentifiers). The time interval must not exceed 100 hours.

CollidingUtc.description: Find blocks that collide with this time range

AvailabilityBlockIds.description: Filter by specific availability block IDs

tools.name: getAllTasks
tools.description: Returns all tasks of the enterprise, filtered by identifiers or other filters. REQUIRED: At least one filter must be provided (TaskIds, DepartmentIds, ServiceOrderIds, CreatedUtc, ClosedUtc, or DeadlineUtc). LIMITATIONS: Date range filters (CreatedUtc, ClosedUtc, DeadlineUtc) have a maximum interval of 3 months and 1 day. Array filters (TaskIds, DepartmentIds, ServiceOrderIds) are limited to 1000 items each. The Limitation parameter with Count is mandatory for pagination.

ClosedUtc.description: Date range filter for task closure (max 3 months)

CreatedUtc.description: Date range filter for task creation (max 3 months)

DeadlineUtc.description: Date range filter for task deadlines (max 3 months)

ServiceOrderIds.description: Filter by service order IDs (reservations or product service orders)

tools.name: addTask
tools.description: Adds a new task to the enterprise, optionally to a specified department

DepartmentId.description: Department ID to assign the task to

ServiceOrderId.description: Service order ID (reservation or product service order) to associate with

tools.name: getAllLoyaltyMemberships
tools.description: Returns all loyalty memberships of the enterprise, optionally filtered by specific loyalty membership identifiers, activity states, or other filter parameters. Note this operation uses Pagination and supports Portfolio Access Tokens.

Codes.description: List of loyalty membership codes, such as identification numbers printed on loyalty cards visible to the customer.

ChainIds.description: Unique identifiers of the chain. If not specified, the operation returns data for all chains within scope of the Access Token.

AccountIds.description: Unique identifiers of accounts (for example Customers or Companies) the membership is associated with.

CreatedUtc.description: The time interval during which the membership was created (max length 3 months)

Limitation.description: Limitation on the quantity of data returned

UpdatedUtc.description: The time interval during which the membership was last updated (max length 3 months)

ActivityStates.description: Whether to return only active, only deleted or both records.

ProviderMembershipIds.description: List of unique loyalty membership identifiers assigned and managed by the external loyalty provider's system.

tools.description: Adds new loyalty memberships to the system

ChainId.description: Unique identifier of the chain. Required when using Portfolio Access Tokens, ignored otherwise.

LoyaltyMemberships.description: Array of loyalty membership objects to create

tools.name: updateLoyaltyMemberships
tools.description: Updates information about the specified loyalty memberships. Note this operation supports Portfolio Access Tokens.

tools.name: deleteLoyaltyMemberships
tools.description: Deletes loyalty memberships

LoyaltyMembershipIds.description: Unique identifier of the loyalty memberships to be deleted
